name: GerbView Project
summary: A GBW file is a project created by Software Companions GerbView, a program for managing Gerber and Drill files, such as .GTL , .GBL and .DRL files, which are integral for designing printed circuit boards ( PCBs ). It contains information about a workspace, including references to loaded Gerber files, layer settings, and other project configurations. GBW files do not store the actual design data but include information to keep track of the files contained in the project and how the app displays them.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
